meanings.definition: A type of acrylic resin or plastic material.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry box was made of shiny lucite.
meanings.sent2: She admired the lucite vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The lucite cupcake topper looked like a tiny crystal.
meanings.sent4: The lucite sculpture gleamed under the gallery lights.
meanings.sent5: The lucite material was so clear, it almost seemed invisible.

meanings.definition: To make or create something using lucite.
meanings.sent1: He decided to lucite a new display case for his collectibles.
meanings.sent2: She carefully lucited the keychain as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The artist lucited a beautiful figurine out of the clear material.
meanings.sent4: They lucited a unique lampshade for the living room.
meanings.sent5: The designer lucited a stunning necklace that caught everyone's eye.
